distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tcpdump fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-8037: Fixed an issue where PPP decapsulator did not allocate the right buffer size (bsc#1178466).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The ppp decapsulator in tcpdump 4.9.3 can be convinced to allocate a large amount of memory.
